panels.title: File IO Stats ____Since Startup ___ till ___ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___
File IO Stats - Since Startup__till____${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}_____ - "__${sql_schedulers} CPUs__"  - [$fqdn] - [$ip]
File IO Stats - Selective - "__${sql_schedulers} CPUs__" @ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}

targets.rawSql:
declare @sql nvarchar(max);
declare @params nvarchar(max);
declare @sql_instance varchar(255);
declare @perfmon_host_name varchar(255);
declare @start_time_utc datetime2;
declare @end_time_utc datetime2;
--declare @delta_minutes int;
declare @disk_drive varchar(255) = '$disk_drive';
declare @database varchar(255) = '$database';

set @sql_instance = '$server';
--set @perfmon_host_name = '$perfmon_host_name';
--set @start_time_utc = $__timeFrom();
set @start_time_utc = dateadd(second,$sqlserver_start_time_utc/1000,'1970-01-01 00:00:00');
--set @end_time_utc = $__timeTo();
set @end_time_utc = $__timeFrom();
--select @start_time_utc as start_time, @end_time_utc as end_time;
--set @delta_minutes = $cpu_delta_minutes;
set @database = case when ltrim(rtrim(@database)) = '__All__' then null else @database end;
set @disk_drive = case when ltrim(rtrim(@disk_drive)) = '__All__' then null else @disk_drive end;
set @params = N'@start_time_utc datetime2, @end_time_utc datetime2, @disk_drive varchar(255), @database varchar(255)';

set quoted_identifier off;
set @sql = "
set nocount on;
declare @schedulers smallint;
declare @StatstatsTop tinyint = 10;
declare @StatsPercentTop int = 99;
declare @sample_sec bigint;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap1 datetime2;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap2 datetime2;

--select @start_time_utc = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, getdate(), getutcdate()), sqlserver_start_time) from sys.dm_os_sys_info;
select @schedulers = count(*) from sys.dm_os_schedulers where status = 'VISIBLE ONLINE' and is_online = 1;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap2 = collection_time_utc, @sample_sec = sample_ms/1000
from dbo.file_io_stats s2
where s2.collection_time_utc <= @end_time_utc
order by collection_time_utc desc;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap1 = collection_time_utc
from dbo.file_io_stats s1
where collection_time_utc >=  dateadd(second,-@sample_sec, @collect_time_utc_snap2)
order by collection_time_utc asc;

--select @collect_time_utc_snap1, @collect_time_utc_snap2;

;WITH [DiffStats] AS
(	SELECT	-- Stats that weren't in the first snapshot
			--[ts2].[collection_time_utc],
			[ts2].[database_name],
			[ts2].[database_id],
			[ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[ts2].[file_id],
			[ts2].[file_location],
			[ts2].[sample_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_reads],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[ts2].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_writes],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[ts2].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall],
			[ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[ts2].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NULL
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
	--
	UNION
	--
	SELECT	-- Diff of Stats in both snapshots
			--[collection_time_utc] = [ts2].[collection_time_utc] - [ts1].[collection_time_utc],
			[database_name] = [ts2].[database_name],
			[database_id] = [ts2].[database_id],
			[file_logical_name] = [ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[file_id] = [ts2].[file_id],
			[file_location] = [ts2].[file_location],
			[sample_ms] = [ts2].[sample_ms] - [ts1].[sample_ms],
			[num_of_reads] = [ts2].[num_of_reads] - [ts1].[num_of_reads],
			[num_of_bytes_read] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_read] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[io_stall_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[num_of_writes] = [ts2].[num_of_writes] - [ts1].[num_of_writes],
			[num_of_bytes_written] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_written] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[io_stall_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[io_stall] = [ts2].[io_stall] - [ts1].[io_stall],
			[size_on_disk_bytes] = [ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[io_pending_count] = [ts2].[io_pending_count] - [ts1].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NOT NULL
	AND ( ([ts2].[num_of_reads]+[ts2].[num_of_writes]) - ([ts1].[num_of_reads]+[ts1].[num_of_writes]) ) > 0
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
)
,[t_DiskDrives] AS 
(	select ds.disk_volume
	from dbo.disk_space ds
	where ds.collection_time_utc = (select max(i.collection_time_utc) from dbo.disk_space i)
	"+(case when @disk_drive is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"and ds.disk_volume = @disk_drive
)
,[t_FileIO] AS
(	SELECT	[running_query] = 'File IO Stats', [sample_ms], [database_name], 
			[file_name_DISPLAY] = [file_logical_name]+' '+QUOTENAME(case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end),
			[file_logical_name], [file_location], dv.disk_volume, [size_on_disk_bytes],
			[file_type] = case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end,

			[total_reads_writes] = [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes], 
			[num_of_bytes_read], [num_of_bytes_written], 
			[total_reads_writes_bytes] = [num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written],
			
			[reads_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[writes_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[pcnt_reads_writes] = convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)) + ' / ' + convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)),

			--[num_of_reads], [io_stall_read_ms], [num_of_writes],  [io_stall_write_ms],
			--[io_stall], [io_pending_ms_ticks_total],
			
			[read_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_read_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_reads]) end),
			[write_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_write_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_writes]) end),
			[latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall] * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes])) end),

			[avg_bytes_per_read] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_read] * 1.0) / [num_of_reads] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_write] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_written] * 1.0) / [num_of_writes] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_transfer] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 and [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( (([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads]+[num_of_writes]) ) end)
	FROM [DiffStats] fis
	CROSS APPLY (
			select top 1 dd.disk_volume
			from [t_DiskDrives] dd
			where fis.file_location like (dd.disk_volume+'%')
			order by len(dd.disk_volume) desc
		) dv
)
select *
from [t_FileIO] fio
order by ([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) desc
"
set quoted_identifier on;

if ($is_local = 1)
  exec dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;
else
  exec [$server].[$dba_db].dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;

panels.title: File IO Stats ____Since Startup ___ till ___ ${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___

targets.rawSql:
declare @sql nvarchar(max);
declare @params nvarchar(max);
declare @sql_instance varchar(255);
--declare @perfmon_host_name varchar(255);
declare @start_time_utc datetime2;
declare @end_time_utc datetime2;
--declare @delta_minutes int;
declare @disk_drive varchar(255) = '$disk_drive';
declare @database varchar(255) = '$database';

set @sql_instance = '$server';
--set @perfmon_host_name = '$perfmon_host_name';
set @start_time_utc = $__timeFrom();
set @end_time_utc = $__timeTo();
--set @delta_minutes = $cpu_delta_minutes;
set @database = case when ltrim(rtrim(@database)) = '__All__' then null else @database end;
set @disk_drive = case when ltrim(rtrim(@disk_drive)) = '__All__' then null else @disk_drive end;
set @params = N'@start_time_utc datetime2, @end_time_utc datetime2, @disk_drive varchar(255), @database varchar(255)';

set quoted_identifier off;
set @sql = "
set nocount on;
declare @schedulers smallint;
declare @StatstatsTop tinyint = 10;
declare @StatsPercentTop int = 99;
declare @sample_sec bigint;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap1 datetime2;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap2 datetime2;

--select @start_time_utc = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, getdate(), getutcdate()), sqlserver_start_time) from sys.dm_os_sys_info;
select @schedulers = count(*) from sys.dm_os_schedulers where status = 'VISIBLE ONLINE' and is_online = 1;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap2 = collection_time_utc, @sample_sec = sample_ms/1000
from dbo.file_io_stats s2
where s2.collection_time_utc <= @end_time_utc
order by collection_time_utc desc;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap1 = collection_time_utc
from dbo.file_io_stats s1
where collection_time_utc >=  (case when dateadd(second,-@sample_sec, @collect_time_utc_snap2) > @start_time_utc 
																		then dateadd(second,-@sample_sec, @collect_time_utc_snap2) 
																		else @start_time_utc end)
order by collection_time_utc asc;

--select @collect_time_utc_snap1, @collect_time_utc_snap2;

;WITH [DiffStats] AS
(	SELECT	-- Stats that weren't in the first snapshot
			--[ts2].[collection_time_utc],
			[ts2].[database_name],
			[ts2].[database_id],
			[ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[ts2].[file_id],
			[ts2].[file_location],
			[ts2].[sample_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_reads],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[ts2].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_writes],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[ts2].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall],
			[ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[ts2].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NULL
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
	--
	UNION
	--
	SELECT	-- Diff of Stats in both snapshots
			--[collection_time_utc] = [ts2].[collection_time_utc] - [ts1].[collection_time_utc],
			[database_name] = [ts2].[database_name],
			[database_id] = [ts2].[database_id],
			[file_logical_name] = [ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[file_id] = [ts2].[file_id],
			[file_location] = [ts2].[file_location],
			[sample_ms] = [ts2].[sample_ms] - [ts1].[sample_ms],
			[num_of_reads] = [ts2].[num_of_reads] - [ts1].[num_of_reads],
			[num_of_bytes_read] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_read] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[io_stall_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[num_of_writes] = [ts2].[num_of_writes] - [ts1].[num_of_writes],
			[num_of_bytes_written] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_written] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[io_stall_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[io_stall] = [ts2].[io_stall] - [ts1].[io_stall],
			[size_on_disk_bytes] = [ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[io_pending_count] = [ts2].[io_pending_count] - [ts1].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NOT NULL
	AND ( ([ts2].[num_of_reads]+[ts2].[num_of_writes]) - ([ts1].[num_of_reads]+[ts1].[num_of_writes]) ) > 0
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
)
,[t_DiskDrives] AS 
(	select ds.disk_volume
	from dbo.disk_space ds
	where ds.collection_time_utc = (select max(i.collection_time_utc) from dbo.disk_space i)
	"+(case when @disk_drive is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"and ds.disk_volume = @disk_drive
)
,[t_FileIO] AS
(	SELECT	[running_query] = 'File IO Stats', [sample_ms], [database_name], 
			[file_name_DISPLAY] = [file_logical_name]+' '+QUOTENAME(case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end),
			[file_logical_name], [file_location], dv.disk_volume, [size_on_disk_bytes],
			[file_type] = case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end,

			[total_reads_writes] = [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes], 
			[num_of_bytes_read], [num_of_bytes_written], 
			[total_reads_writes_bytes] = [num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written],
			
			[reads_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[writes_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[pcnt_reads_writes] = convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)) + ' / ' + convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)),

			--[num_of_reads], [io_stall_read_ms], [num_of_writes],  [io_stall_write_ms],
			--[io_stall], [io_pending_ms_ticks_total],
			
			[read_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_read_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_reads]) end),
			[write_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_write_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_writes]) end),
			[latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall] * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes])) end),

			[avg_bytes_per_read] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_read] * 1.0) / [num_of_reads] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_write] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_written] * 1.0) / [num_of_writes] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_transfer] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 and [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( (([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads]+[num_of_writes]) ) end)
	FROM [DiffStats] fis
	CROSS APPLY (
			select top 1 dd.disk_volume
			from [t_DiskDrives] dd
			where fis.file_location like (dd.disk_volume+'%')
			order by len(dd.disk_volume) desc
		) dv
)
select *
from [t_FileIO] fio
order by ([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) desc
"
set quoted_identifier on;

--if (@sql_instance = SERVERPROPERTY('SERVERNAME'))
if ($is_local = 1)
  exec dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;
else
  exec [$server].[$dba_db].dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;

panels.title: File IO Stats ____In Selected Time Duration____Since____${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___till___${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}____
[${server}] - Db File IO Stats - Read/Writes Data
File IO Stats - Reads/Writes (Data) - Histogram -  [$fqdn] - [$ip] - @ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
[${server}] - Db File IO Stats - # Read/Writes
File IO Stats - Read/Writes (#) - Histogram -  [$fqdn] - [$ip] - @ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
[${server}] - Db IO Stats - Read/Writes Data
Database IO Stats - Reads/Writes  - Trend  -  [$fqdn] - [$ip] - @ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
Database IO Stats ____Since Startup ___ till ___ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___
Database IO Stats - Since Startup__till____${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}_____ - "__${sql_schedulers} CPUs__"  - [$fqdn] - [$ip]
Database IO Stats ____Since Startup ___ till ___ ${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___

targets.rawSql:
declare @sql nvarchar(max);
declare @params nvarchar(max);
declare @sql_instance varchar(255);
declare @start_time_utc datetime2;
declare @end_time_utc datetime2;
declare @disk_drive varchar(255) = '$disk_drive';
declare @database varchar(255) = '$database';

set @database = case when ltrim(rtrim(@database)) = '__All__' then null else @database end;
set @disk_drive = case when ltrim(rtrim(@disk_drive)) = '__All__' then null else @disk_drive end;

set @sql_instance = '$server';
set @start_time_utc = $__timeFrom();
set @end_time_utc = $__timeTo();
set @params = N'@start_time_utc datetime2, @end_time_utc datetime2, @disk_drive varchar(255), @database varchar(255)';

set quoted_identifier off;
set @sql = "
set nocount on;
declare @schedulers smallint;
declare @StatstatsTop tinyint = 10;
declare @StatsPercentTop int = 99;
declare @sample_sec bigint;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap1 datetime2;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap2 datetime2;

select @schedulers = count(*) from sys.dm_os_schedulers where status = 'VISIBLE ONLINE' and is_online = 1;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap2 = collection_time_utc, @sample_sec = sample_ms/1000
from dbo.file_io_stats s2
where s2.collection_time_utc <= @end_time_utc
order by collection_time_utc desc;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap1 = collection_time_utc
from dbo.file_io_stats s1
where collection_time_utc >=  (case when dateadd(second,-@sample_sec, @collect_time_utc_snap2) > @start_time_utc 
																		then dateadd(second,-@sample_sec, @collect_time_utc_snap2) 
																		else @start_time_utc end)
order by collection_time_utc asc;

;WITH [DiffStats] AS
(	SELECT	-- Stats that weren't in the first snapshot
			--[ts2].[collection_time_utc],
			[ts2].[database_name],
			[ts2].[database_id],
			[ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[ts2].[file_id],
			[ts2].[file_location],
			[ts2].[sample_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_reads],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[ts2].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_writes],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[ts2].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall],
			[ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[ts2].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NULL
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
	--
	UNION
	--
	SELECT	-- Diff of Stats in both snapshots
			[database_name] = [ts2].[database_name],
			[database_id] = [ts2].[database_id],
			[file_logical_name] = [ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[file_id] = [ts2].[file_id],
			[file_location] = [ts2].[file_location],
			[sample_ms] = [ts2].[sample_ms] - [ts1].[sample_ms],
			[num_of_reads] = [ts2].[num_of_reads] - [ts1].[num_of_reads],
			[num_of_bytes_read] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_read] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[io_stall_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[num_of_writes] = [ts2].[num_of_writes] - [ts1].[num_of_writes],
			[num_of_bytes_written] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_written] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[io_stall_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[io_stall] = [ts2].[io_stall] - [ts1].[io_stall],
			[size_on_disk_bytes] = [ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[io_pending_count] = [ts2].[io_pending_count] - [ts1].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NOT NULL
	AND ( ([ts2].[num_of_reads]+[ts2].[num_of_writes]) - ([ts1].[num_of_reads]+[ts1].[num_of_writes]) ) > 0
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
)
,[t_DiskDrives] AS 
(	select ds.disk_volume, ds.capacity_mb, ds.free_mb
	from dbo.disk_space ds
	where ds.collection_time_utc = (select max(i.collection_time_utc) from dbo.disk_space i)
	"+(case when @disk_drive is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"and ds.disk_volume = @disk_drive
)
,[t_FileIO] AS
(	SELECT	[running_query] = 'File IO Stats', [sample_ms], [database_name], 
			[file_name_DISPLAY] = [file_logical_name]+' '+QUOTENAME(case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end),
			[file_logical_name], [file_location], dv.disk_volume, [size_on_disk_bytes],
			[file_type] = case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end,

			[total_reads_writes] = [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes],
			[total_reads_writes_stall_ms] = [io_stall_read_ms]+[io_stall_write_ms],
			[num_of_bytes_read], [num_of_bytes_written], 
			[total_reads_writes_bytes] = [num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written],
			
			[reads_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[writes_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[pcnt_reads_writes] = convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)) + ' / ' + convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)),
			
			[read_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_read_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_reads]) end),
			[write_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_write_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_writes]) end),
			[latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall] * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes])) end),

			[avg_bytes_per_read] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_read] * 1.0) / [num_of_reads] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_write] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_written] * 1.0) / [num_of_writes] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_transfer] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 and [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( (([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads]+[num_of_writes]) ) end)
	FROM [DiffStats] fis
	CROSS APPLY (
			select top 1 dd.*
			from [t_DiskDrives] dd
			where fis.file_location like (dd.disk_volume+'%')
			order by len(dd.disk_volume) desc
		) dv
)
select	[running_query] = max(running_query),
		--[collection_time_utc] = max(collection_time_utc),
		[sample_ms] = max(sample_ms),
		[database_name],
		[files_count] = count(*),
		[disk_drive_count] = count(distinct dd.disk_volume),
		[capacity_mb] = max(dd.capacity_mb), 
		[free_mb] = max(dd.free_mb),
		[db_files_size_on_disk_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(size_on_disk_bytes/1024.0/1024)),
		[total_reads_writes] = sum(total_reads_writes),
		[reads_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(num_of_bytes_read/1024.0/1024)),
		[writes_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(num_of_bytes_written/1024.0/1024)),
		[reads_writes_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum( (num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)/1024.0/1024 )),
		[pcnt_reads_writes] = convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),(sum(num_of_bytes_read)*100.0/sum(num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)))) + ' / ' + convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),(sum(num_of_bytes_written)*100.0/sum(num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)))),
		[avg_read_write_stall_ms] = convert(numeric(20,0),(case when sum(total_reads_writes) > 0 then sum(total_reads_writes_stall_ms)*1.0/sum(total_reads_writes) else 0.0 end))
from [t_FileIO] fio
left join [t_DiskDrives] dd on dd.disk_volume = fio.disk_volume
group by database_name
order by [reads_writes_mb] desc
"
set quoted_identifier on;

--if (@sql_instance = SERVERPROPERTY('SERVERNAME'))
if ($is_local = 1)
  exec dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;
else
  exec [$server].[$dba_db].dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;

panels.title: Database IO Stats ____In Selected Time Duration____Since____${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___till___${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}____
Database IO Stats - Selective - "__${sql_schedulers} CPUs__" @ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
Disk IO Stats ____Since Startup ___ till ___ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___
Disk IO Stats - Since Startup__till____${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}_____ - "__${sql_schedulers} CPUs__"  - [$fqdn] - [$ip]

targets.rawSql:
declare @sql nvarchar(max);
declare @params nvarchar(max);
declare @sql_instance varchar(255);
declare @perfmon_host_name varchar(255);
declare @start_time_utc datetime2;
declare @end_time_utc datetime2;
--declare @delta_minutes int;
declare @disk_drive varchar(255) = '$disk_drive';
declare @database varchar(255) = '$database';

set @database = case when ltrim(rtrim(@database)) = '__All__' then null else @database end;
set @disk_drive = case when ltrim(rtrim(@disk_drive)) = '__All__' then null else @disk_drive end;

set @sql_instance = '$server';
--set @perfmon_host_name = '$perfmon_host_name';
--set @start_time_utc = $__timeFrom();
set @start_time_utc = dateadd(second,$sqlserver_start_time_utc/1000,'1970-01-01 00:00:00');
--set @end_time_utc = $__timeTo();
set @end_time_utc = $__timeFrom();
--select @start_time_utc as start_time, @end_time_utc as end_time;
--set @delta_minutes = $cpu_delta_minutes;
set @params = N'@start_time_utc datetime2, @end_time_utc datetime2, @disk_drive varchar(255), @database varchar(255)';

set quoted_identifier off;
set @sql = "
set nocount on;
declare @schedulers smallint;
declare @StatstatsTop tinyint = 10;
declare @StatsPercentTop int = 99;
declare @sample_sec bigint;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap1 datetime2;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap2 datetime2;

--select @start_time_utc = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, getdate(), getutcdate()), sqlserver_start_time) from sys.dm_os_sys_info;
select @schedulers = count(*) from sys.dm_os_schedulers where status = 'VISIBLE ONLINE' and is_online = 1;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap2 = collection_time_utc, @sample_sec = sample_ms/1000
from dbo.file_io_stats s2
where s2.collection_time_utc <= @end_time_utc
order by collection_time_utc desc;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap1 = collection_time_utc
from dbo.file_io_stats s1
where collection_time_utc >= dateadd(second,-@sample_sec, @collect_time_utc_snap2)
order by collection_time_utc asc;

;WITH [DiffStats] AS
(	SELECT	-- Stats that weren't in the first snapshot
			--[ts2].[collection_time_utc],
			[ts2].[database_name],
			[ts2].[database_id],
			[ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[ts2].[file_id],
			[ts2].[file_location],
			[ts2].[sample_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_reads],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[ts2].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_writes],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[ts2].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall],
			[ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[ts2].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NULL
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
	--
	UNION
	--
	SELECT	-- Diff of Stats in both snapshots
			--[collection_time_utc] = [ts2].[collection_time_utc] - [ts1].[collection_time_utc],
			[database_name] = [ts2].[database_name],
			[database_id] = [ts2].[database_id],
			[file_logical_name] = [ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[file_id] = [ts2].[file_id],
			[file_location] = [ts2].[file_location],
			[sample_ms] = [ts2].[sample_ms] - [ts1].[sample_ms],
			[num_of_reads] = [ts2].[num_of_reads] - [ts1].[num_of_reads],
			[num_of_bytes_read] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_read] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[io_stall_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[num_of_writes] = [ts2].[num_of_writes] - [ts1].[num_of_writes],
			[num_of_bytes_written] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_written] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[io_stall_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[io_stall] = [ts2].[io_stall] - [ts1].[io_stall],
			[size_on_disk_bytes] = [ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[io_pending_count] = [ts2].[io_pending_count] - [ts1].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NOT NULL
	AND ( ([ts2].[num_of_reads]+[ts2].[num_of_writes]) - ([ts1].[num_of_reads]+[ts1].[num_of_writes]) ) > 0
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
)
,[t_DiskDrives] AS 
(	select ds.disk_volume, ds.capacity_mb, ds.free_mb
	from dbo.disk_space ds
	where ds.collection_time_utc = (select max(i.collection_time_utc) from dbo.disk_space i)
	"+(case when @disk_drive is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"and ds.disk_volume = @disk_drive
)
,[t_FileIO] AS
(	SELECT	[running_query] = 'File IO Stats', [sample_ms], [database_name], 
			[file_name_DISPLAY] = [file_logical_name]+' '+QUOTENAME(case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end),
			[file_logical_name], [file_location], dv.disk_volume, [size_on_disk_bytes],
			[file_type] = case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end,

			[total_reads_writes] = [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes],
			[total_reads_writes_stall_ms] = [io_stall_read_ms]+[io_stall_write_ms],
			[num_of_bytes_read], [num_of_bytes_written], 
			[total_reads_writes_bytes] = [num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written],
			
			[reads_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[writes_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[pcnt_reads_writes] = convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)) + ' / ' + convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)),
			
			[read_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_read_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_reads]) end),
			[write_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_write_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_writes]) end),
			[latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall] * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes])) end),

			[avg_bytes_per_read] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_read] * 1.0) / [num_of_reads] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_write] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_written] * 1.0) / [num_of_writes] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_transfer] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 and [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( (([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads]+[num_of_writes]) ) end)
	FROM [DiffStats] fis
	CROSS APPLY (
			select top 1 dd.*
			from [t_DiskDrives] dd
			where fis.file_location like (dd.disk_volume+'%')
			order by len(dd.disk_volume) desc
		) dv
)
select	[running_query] = max(running_query),
		--[collection_time_utc] = max(collection_time_utc),
		[sample_ms] = max(sample_ms),
		[database_count] = count(distinct database_name),
		[files_count] = count(*),
		[disk_volume] = max(dd.disk_volume), 
		[capacity_mb] = max(dd.capacity_mb), 
		[free_mb] = max(dd.free_mb),
		[db_files_size_on_disk_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(size_on_disk_bytes/1024.0/1024)),
		[total_reads_writes] = sum(total_reads_writes),
		[reads_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(num_of_bytes_read/1024.0/1024)),
		[writes_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(num_of_bytes_written/1024.0/1024)),
		[reads_writes_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum( (num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)/1024.0/1024 )),
		[pcnt_reads_writes] = convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),(sum(num_of_bytes_read)*100.0/sum(num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)))) 
								+ ' / ' + 
								convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),(sum(num_of_bytes_written)*100.0/sum(num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)))),
		[avg_read_write_stall_ms] = convert(numeric(20,0),(case when sum(total_reads_writes) <> 0 then sum(total_reads_writes_stall_ms)*1.0/sum(total_reads_writes) else 0.0 end))
from [t_FileIO] fio
left join [t_DiskDrives] dd on dd.disk_volume = fio.disk_volume
group by dd.disk_volume
order by [reads_writes_mb] desc
"
set quoted_identifier on;

--if (@sql_instance = SERVERPROPERTY('SERVERNAME'))
if ($is_local = 1)
  exec dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;
else
  exec [$server].[$dba_db].dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;

panels.title: Disk IO Stats ____Since Startup ___ till ___ ${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___

targets.rawSql:
declare @sql nvarchar(max);
declare @params nvarchar(max);
declare @sql_instance varchar(255);
--declare @perfmon_host_name varchar(255);
declare @start_time_utc datetime2;
declare @end_time_utc datetime2;
--declare @delta_minutes int;
declare @disk_drive varchar(255) = '$disk_drive';
declare @database varchar(255) = '$database';

set @database = case when ltrim(rtrim(@database)) = '__All__' then null else @database end;
set @disk_drive = case when ltrim(rtrim(@disk_drive)) = '__All__' then null else @disk_drive end;

set @sql_instance = '$server';
--set @perfmon_host_name = '$perfmon_host_name';
set @start_time_utc = $__timeFrom();
set @end_time_utc = $__timeTo();
--set @delta_minutes = $cpu_delta_minutes;
set @params = N'@start_time_utc datetime2, @end_time_utc datetime2, @disk_drive varchar(255), @database varchar(255)';

set quoted_identifier off;
set @sql = "
set nocount on;
declare @schedulers smallint;
declare @StatstatsTop tinyint = 10;
declare @StatsPercentTop int = 99;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap1 datetime2;
declare @collect_time_utc_snap2 datetime2;

--select @start_time_utc = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, getdate(), getutcdate()), sqlserver_start_time) from sys.dm_os_sys_info;
select @schedulers = count(*) from sys.dm_os_schedulers where status = 'VISIBLE ONLINE' and is_online = 1;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap2 = collection_time_utc
from dbo.file_io_stats s2
where s2.collection_time_utc <= @end_time_utc
order by collection_time_utc desc;

select top 1 @collect_time_utc_snap1 = collection_time_utc
from dbo.file_io_stats s1
where collection_time_utc >= @start_time_utc
order by collection_time_utc asc;

--select @collect_time_utc_snap1, @collect_time_utc_snap2;

;WITH [DiffStats] AS
(	SELECT	-- Stats that weren't in the first snapshot
			--[ts2].[collection_time_utc],
			[ts2].[database_name],
			[ts2].[database_id],
			[ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[ts2].[file_id],
			[ts2].[file_location],
			[ts2].[sample_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_reads],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[ts2].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[ts2].[num_of_writes],
			[ts2].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[ts2].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[ts2].[io_stall],
			[ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[ts2].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NULL
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
	--
	UNION
	--
	SELECT	-- Diff of Stats in both snapshots
			--[collection_time_utc] = [ts2].[collection_time_utc] - [ts1].[collection_time_utc],
			[database_name] = [ts2].[database_name],
			[database_id] = [ts2].[database_id],
			[file_logical_name] = [ts2].[file_logical_name],
			[file_id] = [ts2].[file_id],
			[file_location] = [ts2].[file_location],
			[sample_ms] = [ts2].[sample_ms] - [ts1].[sample_ms],
			[num_of_reads] = [ts2].[num_of_reads] - [ts1].[num_of_reads],
			[num_of_bytes_read] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_read] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_read],
			[io_stall_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_read_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_read_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_read_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_read_ms],
			[num_of_writes] = [ts2].[num_of_writes] - [ts1].[num_of_writes],
			[num_of_bytes_written] = [ts2].[num_of_bytes_written] - [ts1].[num_of_bytes_written],
			[io_stall_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_write_ms],
			[io_stall_queued_write_ms] = [ts2].[io_stall_queued_write_ms] - [ts1].[io_stall_queued_write_ms],
			[io_stall] = [ts2].[io_stall] - [ts1].[io_stall],
			[size_on_disk_bytes] = [ts2].[size_on_disk_bytes],
			[io_pending_count] = [ts2].[io_pending_count] - [ts1].[io_pending_count]
	FROM dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts2]
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.file_io_stats AS [ts1]
		ON [ts2].[database_name] = [ts1].[database_name]
		AND [ts2].[file_logical_name] = [ts1].[file_logical_name]
		AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
		AND [ts1].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap1
	WHERE [ts1].[file_logical_name] IS NOT NULL
	AND ( ([ts2].[num_of_reads]+[ts2].[num_of_writes]) - ([ts1].[num_of_reads]+[ts1].[num_of_writes]) ) > 0
	AND [ts2].collection_time_utc = @collect_time_utc_snap2
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts1.[database_name] = @database
	"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"AND ts2.[database_name] = @database
)
,[t_DiskDrives] AS 
(	select ds.disk_volume, ds.capacity_mb, ds.free_mb
	from dbo.disk_space ds
	where ds.collection_time_utc = (select max(i.collection_time_utc) from dbo.disk_space i)
	"+(case when @disk_drive is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"and ds.disk_volume = @disk_drive
)
,[t_FileIO] AS
(	SELECT	[running_query] = 'File IO Stats', [sample_ms], [database_name], 
			[file_name_DISPLAY] = [file_logical_name]+' '+QUOTENAME(case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end),
			[file_logical_name], [file_location], dv.disk_volume, [size_on_disk_bytes],
			[file_type] = case when right(file_location,3) = 'ldf' then 'LOG' else 'DATA' end,

			[total_reads_writes] = [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes],
			[total_reads_writes_stall_ms] = [io_stall_read_ms]+[io_stall_write_ms],
			[num_of_bytes_read], [num_of_bytes_written], 
			[total_reads_writes_bytes] = [num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written],
			
			[reads_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[writes_pcnt] = convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end),
			[pcnt_reads_writes] = convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_read]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)) + ' / ' + convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),case when [num_of_bytes_read] = 0 and [num_of_bytes_written] = 0 then 0
								else 100.0 * ([num_of_bytes_written]*1.0)/([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) end)),
			
			[read_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_read_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_reads]) end),
			[write_latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall_write_ms] * 1.0)/[num_of_writes]) end),
			[latency_ms] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else (([io_stall] * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads] + [num_of_writes])) end),

			[avg_bytes_per_read] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_read] * 1.0) / [num_of_reads] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_write] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( ([num_of_bytes_written] * 1.0) / [num_of_writes] ) end),
			[avg_bytes_per_transfer] = convert(numeric(20,2), case when [num_of_reads] = 0 and [num_of_writes] = 0 then 0 else ( (([num_of_bytes_read]+[num_of_bytes_written]) * 1.0) / ([num_of_reads]+[num_of_writes]) ) end)
	FROM [DiffStats] fis
	CROSS APPLY (
			select top 1 dd.*
			from [t_DiskDrives] dd
			where fis.file_location like (dd.disk_volume+'%')
			order by len(dd.disk_volume) desc
		) dv
)
select	[running_query] = max(running_query),
		[sample_ms] = max(sample_ms),
		[database_count] = count(distinct database_name),
		[files_count] = count(*),
		[disk_volume] = max(dd.disk_volume), 
		[capacity_mb] = max(dd.capacity_mb), 
		[free_mb] = max(dd.free_mb),
		[db_files_size_on_disk_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(size_on_disk_bytes/1024.0/1024)),
		[total_reads_writes] = sum(total_reads_writes),
		[reads_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(num_of_bytes_read/1024.0/1024)),
		[writes_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum(num_of_bytes_written/1024.0/1024)),
		[reads_writes_mb] = convert(numeric(20,2),sum( (num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)/1024.0/1024 )),
		[pcnt_reads_writes] = convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),(sum(num_of_bytes_read)*100.0/sum(num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)))) 
								+ ' / ' + 
								convert(varchar,convert(numeric(20,2),(sum(num_of_bytes_written)*100.0/sum(num_of_bytes_read+num_of_bytes_written)))),
		[avg_read_write_stall_ms] = convert(numeric(20,0),(case when sum(total_reads_writes) <> 0 then sum(total_reads_writes_stall_ms)*1.0/sum(total_reads_writes) else 0.0 end))
from [t_FileIO] fio
left join [t_DiskDrives] dd on dd.disk_volume = fio.disk_volume
group by dd.disk_volume
order by [reads_writes_mb] desc
"
set quoted_identifier on;

--if (@sql_instance = SERVERPROPERTY('SERVERNAME'))
if ($is_local = 1)
  exec dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;
else
  exec [$server].[$dba_db].dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @database;

panels.title: Disk IO Stats ____In Selected Time Duration____Since____${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}___till___${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}____
Disk IO Stats - Selective - "__${sql_schedulers} CPUs__" @ ${collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}

list.label: Sql Instance
list.name: server

list.label: Is Local SQL Instance
list.name: is_local

list.label: DBA Database
list.name: dba_db

list.label: IP Address
list.name: ip

list.label: Collection Time UTC
list.name: collection_time_utc

list.label: SQL Schedulers
list.name: sql_schedulers

list.label: SqlInstance Start Time UTC
list.name: sqlserver_start_time_utc

list.label: Disk Drive
list.name: disk_drive

list.label: Database
list.name: database
